Text: visit to HoustonMike and Vince I will be travelling to the US for two weeks max time I can leave the office at the moment From the June I will be visiting the th workshop for the Community Climate System Model in Breckenridge CO Afterwards I will be coming to the Houston office I will call you regarding the various points on the agenda Regards Christian

RE visit to HoustonVince I will be in Houston from the July to at least the th July I will call you tomorrow morning Houston time to discuss the current issues and how we can move forward in a way that is beneficial for Enron North America the research group the gas desk and the power desk I would like to use tomorrows call to highlight my point of view and where we are heading Basically I would like to discuss a plan of action Thanks Regards Christian
